title: Can't see my club
body:
I made a club, but ever since the bug with clubs I haven't been able to see the club chat or my tag. The club is still up since my friends still have the tag and can see the chat that I'm still in, apparently.
Club name: The Biggest Boys
Tag: XLBoy

replies.body:
Since we have to access some tools in order to resolve this with you, I recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our specialists can help you out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I wrote up a ticket a few months ago and I was told that Riot was still experiencing problems with clubs and to just wait it out.
There were some similar issues a few months ago, but this one is a bit different and it's something that we can influence from our side. You should be set after reaching out in a support ticket. ^.^
